mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.job_no, sa.participant_name, sa.certificate, sea.enter_user_name, sea.enter_job_no, sa.be_rewarded_time, sa.enter_id, sea.enter_time, sea.begin_time, sea.end_time, sea.status, sea.audit_user_id, sea.audit_user_name, sea.audit_time FROM sys_activity sa inner join sys_enter_activity sea on sa.enter_id = sea.id WHERE sea.enter_project_id = #{id} ORDER BY sea.enter_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM sys_activity sa inner join sys_enter_activity sea on sa.enter_id = sea.id WHERE sea.enter_project_id = #{id}
